ing: 1 (12 inch) piece cracker bread or flatbread
1 tablespoon olive oil, plus extra for brushing
1 (8 ounce) package BordenÂ® Cheese Mild Cheddar Shreds
8 strips thick-cut bacon, cooked crisp and broken into 1-inch pieces
des: "Crispy cracker bread rounds topped with shredded cheese, crisp crumbled bacon, tomatoes, red onion, and fresh parsley make easy and delicious pizzas."
ins:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Brush the cracker bread with a small amount of olive oil and place on cookie sheet. Spread 11/2 cups BordenÂ® Cheese Mild Cheddar Shreds evenly around the cracker bread. Top evenly with bacon pieces pizza.
Heat remaining 1 tbsp. olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat until hot.  Add the sliced garlic cloves and sautÃ© until slightly browned. Sprinkle over onto the pizza. Arrange sliced tomatoes and red onions around the pizza.
Add parsley to the remaining Â½ cup cheese and spread over other ingredients.
Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Cut into squares and serve immediately. Garnish with fresh basil leaves, if desired.
